<write_to_file> <path>marketing/landing-pages/automation-saas-strategy.md</path> <content> # SaaS Automation Platform Landing Page Strategy
## Campaign Overview - **Target Audience**: Small business owners (5-25 employees) spending 15+ hours/week on manual tasks - **Primary Goal**: 500+ free trial signups in first month - **Secondary Goal**: 8%+ conversion rate from visitor to trial - **Competitive Positioning**: Easier setup than Zapier, more affordable than Microsoft
## Value Proposition Framework ### Primary Promise "Set up powerful business automation in minutes, not hours - no coding required"
### Supporting Benefits 1. **Speed**: "5-minute setup" vs competitors' complex onboarding 2. **Simplicity**: "No-code visual builder" for non-technical users 3. **Affordability**: "50% less expensive" than enterprise alternatives 4. **Support**: "24/7 human support" vs chatbot-only competitors
## Messaging Hierarchy ### Headline (H1): Primary emotional hook "Stop Drowning in Manual Tasks - Automate Your Business in 5 Minutes"
### Subheadline: Logical proof point "Join 12,000+ small businesses saving 20+ hours per week with our no-code automation platform. Setup takes 5 minutes, not 5 hours."
### CTA: Action-oriented with urgency "Start Your Free 14-Day Trial - No Credit Card Required"
## Content Sections 1. Hero (Headline + CTA + Demo video) 2. Benefits (3 key value props with icons) 3. Social Proof (Customer logos + testimonials) 4. Features (Visual automation builder + integrations) 5. Pricing (Clear plans with trial emphasis) 6. FAQ (Address top 5 objections) 7. Final CTA (Urgency + guarantee)
## Success Metrics - Conversion rate: Target 8%+ - Bounce rate: Keep under 40% - Time on page: Target 2+ minutes - Trial-to-paid: Track for optimization
